title: Werner Peter
text:
Werner Peter (born 25 May 1950 in <a href="Sandersdorf">Sandersdorf</a>) is a former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player from <a href="East%20Germany">East Germany</a>, who won the silver medal with the <a href="East%20Germany%20national%20football%20team">East German national team</a> at the <a href="Football%20at%20the%201980%20Summer%20Olympics">1980 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Moscow">Moscow</a>, <a href="Soviet%20Union">Soviet Union</a>.
He played 255 <a href="DDR-Oberliga">Oberliga</a> matches (66 goals) for <a href="Hallescher%20FC">Hallescher FC</a> Chemie.
Werner Peter obtained a total number of nine caps for his native country, scoring one goal.
